none.$description: Perfectly sharp corners. Use when elements demands no rounding. USED IN: ListContainer, TabBar-Item

0_12x.$description: Softens crisp elements while keeping a sharp feel

0_25x.$description: Radius on small UI pieces and compact elements USED IN: Xsmall buttons, checkboxes.

0_31x.$description: A touch rounder than previous radius. use for elements that need a gentler feel USED IN: Focus outlines on Xsmall buttons.

0_37x.$description: Balanced rounding for small to medium components. USED IN: small and medium buttons and input fields.

0_44x.$description: A touch rounder than previous radius. use for elements that need a gentler feel USED IN: Focus outlines on small and medium buttons.

0_50x.$description: Soft rounding for larger components. USED IN: large buttons.

0_56x.$description: A touch rounder than previous radius. use for elements that need a gentler feel USED IN: Focus outlines on large buttons.

1x.$description: Used on rounder corner for larger elements.

pill.$description: Makes circles or capsules. USED IN: radiobuttons and Badge.

s.$description: 1 px vector stroke - default for XSmall and Small icons.

m.$description: 1.25 px - use when scaling icons to Medium size

l.$description: 1.5 px - thick stroke, use when scaling icons to Large size

transparent.$description:
Invisible outline that still occupies stroke space. Use to avoid layout-shift when a border appears on other states/variants of the same component.

[Themable composite token referencing border tokens from the mode set]

default.$description:
Default 1 px neutral outline for interactive controls (e.g outline buttons).

[Themable composite token referencing border tokens from the mode set]

disabled.$description:
Dimmed 1 px outline (color.border.disabled). Indicates the component cant be interacted with.

[Themable composite token referencing border tokens from the mode set]

focused.$description:
2px focus ring (color.focus.outline) - appears on keyboard or programmatic focus. Meets accessibility contrast.

[Themable composite token referencing border tokens from the mode set]

selected.$description:
1px teal outline (color.border.selected) - shows current selection (e.g. radio, checkbox, TabBar-Item).

[Themable composite token referencing border tokens from the mode set]

selected-accent.$description:
1px outline (color.border.selected) - shows current selection (e.g. table cell, node instance).

[Themable composite token referencing border tokens from the mode set]

error.$description:
1px strong red outline for invalid inputs or destructive elements.

[Themable composite token referencing border tokens from the mode set]

primary.$description:
1 px bold-teal outline for elements using primary color

[Themable composite token referencing border tokens from the mode set]

input.$description:
Neutral 1 px outline specifically tuned for input elements (e.g text-field and textarea, radio and checkbox components.)

[Themable composite token referencing border tokens from the mode set]

default.$description: 1 px neutral divider for most containers and separators.

muted.$description: 1px subtler neutral stroke for low-contrast sections and containers.

subtle.$description: 1px hairline neutral stroke (10% opacity). Use for the faintest elements (e.g dividers).

brand.$description: 1px brand-yellow bar - decorative accent to be used on branded elements e.g Desktop header.

danger.$description: 1px red outline for critical inline messages and containers.

warning.$description: 1px orange outline for warning inline messages and containers.

success.$description: 1px green outline for success inline messages and containers.

info.$description: 1px blue outline for info inline messages and containers.
